name: VEGAS Movie Studio 15 Steam Edition
detailed_description:
More Vegas Movie Studio Editions

http://store.steampowered.com/app/785170/VEGAS_Movie_Studio_15_Platinum_Steam_Edition/


About the Software

With VEGAS Movie Studio 15 Steam Edition, you can edit your videos with total precision. Simply select a file, drag & drop it into the timeline and position it where you want. Add text, effects, filters, transitions and music to videos to achieve perfect results.

Highlights

Latest features in VEGAS Movie Studio 15:

  • Flexible user interface with a hamburger menu system
  • Quick start window with essential first steps
  • Simplified media import
  • Improved support for smartphone videos (including iPhone)
  • Clear Timeline with event healing
  • Advanced hardware acceleration

Video and audio production

Innovative functions for intuitive editing
VEGAS Movie Studio 15 Steam Edition makes editing videos a whole lot of fun. Edit, retouch and organize images and videos easily, with amazing special effects, sophisticated titles and customized music.Edit your gameplays natively in resolutions of up to 4K, then upload the results directly to your channel and share with your subscribers.

Share your results

As soon as you've finished editing your video, it's easy to share it with your clan or other team members.Use the program wizards to quickly upload your videos and gameplays to Facebook, YouTube and Vimeo. VEGAS Movie Studio 15 Platinum Steam Edition automatically uploads your video in the best format for the platform you select. So what are you waiting for? Share your video with the world!

short_description: VEGAS Movie Studio 15 Steam Edition lets you create breathtaking videos in up to 4K resolution without any previous experience and in no time at all. Make each and every one of your videos unique - add finesse, effects, a soundtrack, titles and much more.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Microsoft® Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Supported NVIDIA or AMD GPU
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Microsoft® Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Multicore or multiprocessor for HD or stereoscopic 3D
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Supported NVIDIA or AMD GPU
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-compatible sound card
